Reason: The REUSE_SPACE configuration option in the h2 software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. When the REUSE_SPACE value is increased, it allows for more efficient use of memory by reusing previously allocated space, reducing memory consumption and potentially improving overall system performance. Conversely, decreasing the REUSE_SPACE value may lead to increased memory fragmentation and higher memory usage, negatively affecting system performance.
